properties.title: Readable Web Service messages - soapUI Pro Overview View

section.name: Overview View
section.p: soapUI Pro includes an Overview View for visualizing response or mock-request messages in a form-editor fashion.

Each section contains links (far right) to the corresponding nodes in the XML or Outline editor. Text values have a right-button menu for copying the value to the clipboard and opening URLs in an external browser; URL's are displayed in blue and are directly clickable for opening in an external browser.

img.alt: An example of making Message viewing easy for Web Services

section.p: Next: Structured Outline Editor for Web Services
